content.rendered:
Prishtina REA and networking partners joined forces and expertise to power together the branded DeepTechcamp 2025 as BALKONNECT FESTIVAL 2025
 
It aims to bring together key globally stakeholders, passionate and influencers from the leading industries, TechParks, incubators, accelerators, innovation centres, science parks, finance and banking ecosystem actors, e-solutions, innovators connect and including business angels, venture capitals and investors.
 
This Festival, intends to become the Western Balkans traditional-May event, aiming at gearing up for the digital and green transformation economy powered by artificial intelligence, bigdata analytics and e-platforms, finance and banking, ensuring the key strategic adventurers keep ahead of the curve while remaining focused on our joint mission: Innovate, Transform, e-Solution, Invest
